response.summary:
Wide knowledge in telecommunications, twenty years of experience and successful work performance in roles as Sales Director, Account Manager, Sales Solutions Manager, Care Program Manager, Technical Manager.

Recently as Sales Director and Account Manager, I have been in charge of a thorough and disciplined relationship with several mobile operators, at commercial and operational level; this has allowed me to participate actively in the creation and development of customer's growth strategy, and also modeling and building the technical solutions to capitalize, as a supplier said growth. Being Sales Solution Manager, state-of-the-art technology solutions were provided to the Operators in order to support them to achieve their positioning goals in the telecommunications market, in a cost-effective manner.

By working as Care Program Manager and Technical Manager for one of the largest networks in Latin America, I acquired the knowledge and visibility of the telecommunications technologies, supporting the client in the operation and maintenance management, fulfilling the demanding SLAs and subscriber service requirements, seeking always the profitability of the project and services.

Skills recognized by clients and colleagues, both at commercial and technical levels: Negotiation focused on business growth and customer satisfaction, identification of customer needs, transformation of those needs in projects handled with leadership and open communication with the objective of meeting financial goals. Ease and discipline in acquiring the specific knowledge needed for business development. Willingness to work in a group, with superiors by creating commercial and sales strategies, with colleagues executing these strategies.
response.skills: Sales Management, Pre-sales, Project Management, 3G, Technical Support, TCP/IP, SDH, 2G, Telecommunications, Sales, Oracle, LTE, Team Leadership, Liderazgo de equipos, virtualized RAN, Radio Networks, Systems Management, TMN, ATM networks, Base Transceiver Station

profile_positions.description:
Sales Director for Central America, North of South America and Caribbean Region. Finding business opportunities in mobile operators’ market for virtualized RAN technology, demonstrating the benefits of the solution and product in their business and networks.

Leading successful installation of macro and micro sites in Claro´s network, being able to set up the biggest demo ever installed. Customer full acceptance of solution with no pending technical issues, achieving the entire contractual requirements from the Mobile Operator.
profile_positions.title: Director of Sales

profile_positions.description:
Account Manager for Claro Colombia, one of the biggest Nokia Networks account in Latin America. In charge of sales for the entire 2G/3G/4G radio mobile technologies portfolio.

Doing business development and commercial customer relationship to accomplish year over year to the Nokia revenue growth. Supporting and leading customer contracts renewal process. Active and close teamwork with Solution Managers creating sales opportunities to generate additional sales and new business.
profile_positions.title: Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Sales Solutions Manager for Claro Colombia. In charge of pre-sales and sales for the 2G/3G/4G mobile broadband technologies.

Giving to the customer the optimum and the best radio mobile solutions, including HW equipment and SW features. Abilities to work with colleagues in order to win end to end opportunities. In charge of planning HW demand and revenue recognition according with the business development. Always involved with Supply and Logistics Area to plan efficiently the fabrics efforts.
profile_positions.title: Sales Solution Manager - Radio Access

profile_positions.description:
Care Program Manager for entire Comcel Colombia network. In charge of Customer Care for the 2G platforms (Switch Core, Packet Core, IPT, Radio Access, Network Management Systems), 3G technologies (RNC & Node B Access) and IN networks.

Experience leading Technical Managers Team and more than 25 senior engineers in Customer Care Team.
profile_positions.title: Care Program Manager

profile_positions.description: OSS Technical Manager and OSS Care Team leading. Nokia management platforms commissioning and upgrade projects coordination for: OSS, NetAct, Network Data Warehouse, Traffica and all the related products and applications. Support to sales and delivery areas for several customers: Comcel Colombia, Conecel Ecuador, Telefónica Colombia and Digitel Venezuela.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service OSS Engineer, OSS Team Leader, OSS Technical Manager

profile_positions.description: Customer technical consultancy and support for the CDMA telecommunications management network. Commissioning and upgrading projects coordination for CDMA Management Network platforms in the Bellsouth International Focus Team Project for Colombia and Panama.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Support Engineer

profile_positions.description: Customer technical consultancy and support for SDH/ATM Element Management. Support to sales and delivery areas for several Network Projects: Ericsson Argentina, England, Ukraine, Guatemala, Indonesia and for customers Telefónica Internacional Argentina, Telefónica Internacional Chile, Telefónica Internacional Guatemala, Kievstar Ukraine and Indosat and Telkom in Indonesia. Technical support for ATM access network for Diveo Colombia and Panama.
profile_positions.title: Datacom Support Engineer

profile_positions.description: Specialized in Network Element Management, Network Management, UNIX, Windows. Qualified trainer for technical competence transfer to customers. PDH/SDH Management System platform commissioning and technical support to customers in several countries: Colombia (Empresa de Telecomunicaciones de Bogotá (ETB), Empresas Públicas de Medellín (EEPPM), Capitel and Orbitel Larga Distancia, Empresa Distrital Telecomunicaciones Barranquilla), Indonesia (IM3-Indosat and Telkom), Argentina (Telefónica Internacional Argentina), Guatemala (Telefónica de Guatemala), Ukraine (Kievstart Ukraine).
profile_positions.title: Transmission Networks Commissioning Engineer

company.name: Amdocs
company.description:
We help those who build the future to make it amazing.
In an era where new technologies are born every minute, and the demand for meaningful digital experiences has never been so intense, we unlock our customers’ innovative potential, empowering them to transform their boldest ideas into reality, and make billions of people feel like VIPs.

Our 31,000 employees around the globe are here to accelerate our customers’ migration to the cloud, differentiate in the 5G era, digitalize and automate their operations, and provide end users with the next-generation communication and media experiences that make the world say wow.

Listed on the NASDAQ Global Select Market, Amdocs had revenue of $4.58 billion in fiscal 2022.
